Class Friend

  • Object
    • GameObject
      • Friend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICollider

    public class Friend
extends GameObject
    Simple friend to be used in a game.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk Created on 5/22/2015.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COLLISION_KEY
      The key used in collision detection, tracking, and resolution.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Friend()
      Constructs the friend with the default collision key "Friend".
      Friend(Point2D.Double location)
      Constructs the friend at the given location.
      Friend(Point2D.Double location, int size)
      Constructs the friend at the given location and size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getCollisionKey()
      Returns the collision key used to create the map key for the collision detection and handler functionality.
      void update()
      Update the representation of the game object to reflect its internal state.

        addDetector, addHandler, getBoundingShape, getDetectors, getHandlers, getLocation, getSize
